column5: For someone who needs a pretty good rod at a reasonable price, there is one at Canadian Tire South Barrie. It is a Bob Izumi signature rod reg. $79.99 on for $31.99.  There is only one and it is hidden a bit behind other rods.  There are other rods as well but none as good quality as this one.  Just thought I would give a heads up if anyone was interested in a cheap decent spinning rod.
did you hide it so you could tell us?     J/K
i like the Bob Izumi signature rods i have an ultra light hasnt let me down yet
It is a game of hide and seek.  Let the best player win the prize.  lol (maybe there isn't even a rod ) ha!
Lindsay Canadian Tire has a HUGE fishing selection , for everything , high end gear and everything ! .. shimano Crucials , E21 carrot sticks.. ect !!!! even shimano Calais and the older curados
Eric, did you see those monster 1000yd spools of Trilene XT for $6.99?  I couldn't find any 4, 6 or 8lb, lol.  All that was left was 10 or 12.
Hey Bill I was at Mapleview yesterday and there was still one 6lb XL 1000 yrd spool for 6.99.  I almost bought it but I bought the 8lb one last week so I don't need anymore.
